case_title: Sheikh JAN MUHAMMAD, ADVOCATE, LODHRAN vs Chaudhry MUHAMMAD ALTAF, ADVOCATE, BAR ASSOCIATION, LODHRAN and 9 others
respondant: Chaudhry Muhammad Altaf, Advocate, Bar Association, Lodhran

accussed_details.name: Chaudhry Muhammad Altaf
allegation: Violation of Punjab Legal Practitioners and Bar Councils Rules, 1974
Allowing ineligible voters to cast votes

complaint_summary: Petitioner challenged the election result for the Office of General Secretary, District Bar Association, Lodhran, citing violations of rules and irregularities in voter eligibility.
investigation_summary: The court scrutinized the voter membership records and found six individuals were ineligible to vote due to their voter membership being registered in Bahawalpur and Multan, not Lodhran.
judgment_summary: The court set aside the election result for the Office of General Secretary, District Bar Association, Lodhran, due to irregularities in voter eligibility and directed re-polling within 21 days.
punishment: Election result for the Office of General Secretary set aside; re-polling ordered.
Decision_or_verdict: Petition accepted; election result for General Secretary invalidated.
legal_arguments: Violation of Rule 5.11(xii) of Punjab Legal Practitioners and Bar Councils Rules, 1974
Non-production of Identity Cards by voters
statutes: Punjab Legal Practitioners and Bar Councils Rules, 1974
key_issues: Waiver of rules by contesting candidates
Impact of irregularities on election results

maxims.Legal Principle: Any act required to be done in a particular way must be done in that way and not otherwise.

legal_terms.Eligible Voter: An advocate whose name appears on the roll of the Bar Association and fulfills conditions under Rule 7.10.

words_and_phrases.Voter Membership: The registered association where an advocate is eligible to vote.

summary_vector_notes: Election result for General Secretary invalidated due to irregularities in voter eligibility; re-polling ordered within 21 days.

key_points.challenged_office: General Secretary, District Bar Association, Lodhran
violations: Allowing ineligible voters from Bahawalpur and Multan
Waiving rules of Punjab Legal Practitioners and Bar Councils Rules, 1974
rules_cited: Rule 5.11(xii) of Punjab Legal Practitioners and Bar Councils Rules, 1974
key_points.decision: Election result for General Secretary set aside; re-polling ordered within 21 days.
